headlines.description: Cagliari forward Giovanni Simeone scored for the fourth game in a row to give his side a 1-1 draw at Bologna on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Simeone on target again as Cagliari hold Bologna

headlines.description: Alexis Sanchez produced an imposing performance to inspire Inter Milan to a 6-0 win over Serie A strugglers Brescia at San Siro on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sanchez leads Inter in 6-goal barrage vs. Brescia

headlines.description: Sassuolo made Fiorentina pay dearly for mistakes at both ends of the field as they handed the troubled Tuscans a 3-1 home defeat in Serie A.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sassuolo make Fiorentina pay for mistakes

venue.fullName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

venue.displayName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

headlines.description: AC Milan were rescued by an extraordinary own goal from Francesco Vicari as they fought back to draw 2-2 away to lowly 10-man SPAL.
headlines.shortLinkText: Milan salvage late draw vs. SPAL as Ibrahimovic returns
